mapper.select: select m.id memberId,ml.discount memberDiscount,s.`name` skuName,s.price,ci.nums `number`,si.url img,ci.sku_id skuId,s.description from member m inner join (shopping_cart_item ci,shopping_cart c,sku s,sku_img si,member_level ml) on(m.id = c.member_id and c.id = ci.cart_id and ci.sku_id = s.id and s.id = si.sku_id and m.level_id = ml.id) where m.id = #{memberId}
